Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and protonic ceramic fuel cell (PCFC) have strong features that enables high efficiency power generation and efficient CO2 capture.
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems

Sentencas: Applying these technologies to the fossil fuel and biomass power generation, we can realize ultra-high efficiency zero-emission power generation by capturing liquefied CO2 (LCO2) for easy transport and utilization (CCU) or storage(fossil fuel CCS and bio-energy CCS: BECCS).
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems

Sentencas: In this study, we propose LCO2 capture ultra-efficient power generation systems consist of multi-stage SOFC/PCFC, oxygen or hydrogen transport membrane, CO2 cooling and liquidizing units driven by exhaust heat and generated power by fuel cells.
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems

Sentencas: Net power generation efficiency is estimated through heat mass balance analysis.
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems

Sentencas: As the results for natural gas, proposed PCFC system is suitable and expected 64.7 %LHV net power generation efficiency with more than 99 vol% LCO2 capture.
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems

Sentencas: For biogas direct supply case, net power generation efficiency of proposed PCFC system is 57%LHV with 99 vol% capture of CO2 in the air.
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems

Sentencas: These results indicates that proposed systems have quite strong potential that enables ultra-high efficient CO2-free fossil fuel power generation with CCS and CO2 -reduction biomass fuel power generation with BECCS.
Titulo: Proposal of ultra-high-efficiency zero-emission power generation systems
